text: The men's 200 metres event at the 2005 European Athletics U23 Championships was held in Erfurt, Germany, at Steigerwaldstadion on 15 and 17 July. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; " width="35%" |- |bgcolor="gold"|Gold|| David Alerte ' |- |bgcolor="silver"|Silver|| Sebastian Ernst ' |- |bgcolor="CC9966"|Bronze|| Koura Kaba Fantoni ' |} ==Results== ===Final=== 17 July Wind: 1.3m/s {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !Rank !! Name !! Nationality !! Time !!
